title: MOOC-Based Elementary Social Inquiry Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Device Proficiency and Core Social Studies Concepts
context.additional_context: Learners individually access content via mobile devices, requiring self-directed learning planning for project completion

learning_goals: Learners can analyze one or more local community issues utilizing social inquiry materials provided by MOOC platforms
Learners can establish and execute consistent learning plans for over two weeks through building a learner-led Personal Learning Environment (PLE).
Learners can produce and submit digital content (video/infographics) proposing solutions to community issues through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
